            Jesse McDevitt-Irwin
          
          
            
              Hello world! I am a cedar-strip canoe builder (on leave) and PhD candidate in Sustainable Development at Columbia University. Trained as an economist, I do interdisciplinary research on health and demography.
            
            
              Hello world! I am a cedar-strip canoe builder (on leave) and PhD candidate in Sustainable Development at Columbia University.
